item.title: Mar 4
item.description: Mar 4 [!tldr] Mar 4 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize Learning to code can be intimidating, but it’s actually a fun and rewarding way to explore your creativity. Here are some ways you can get started: watch tutorials on youtube or read articles on websites like codecademy and udemy. There are many free courses available online that can help you learn the basics of coding, from html and css to javascript and python.
